View.Title: GHOST IN THE MACHINE Display Info

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: GHOST IN THE MACHINE
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Target enemy vehicles and aircraft to temporarily take control of them.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: VORTEX LIGHTNING II
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to create a defense weakening vortex.. Focusing down targets stuns & damages them.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: SENTINEL NETWORK
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to call in 3 waves of Protectors.. The sentinels sweep out across the map wave by wave.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: HEAVY METAL I
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Target own units to give a defense boost.. Slows targeted units while active.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: SIPHON III
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Target own units to give them Siphon.. Units gain health while in combat.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: VEHICLE DROP I
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to get a deployment of 2 veteran Kodiaks.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: ROLLING ECONOMY I
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Supply Pads, Generators, and their upgrades now have reduced build times and costs.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: COMBAT SALVAGE
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to have the next 8 non-infantry units respawn at home base.. Units must die within the power's set time frame.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: FORTIFICATIONS I
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: The Stronghold, Fortify, & turret upgrades now have reduced cost & build time.. Base level turrets, shield towers, & Outposts now cost less.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Supply Pads, Generators, and their upgrades now have further reduced build times and costs.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: MAC BLAST III
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to fire a large kinetic slug at the battlefield.. Damages all unit types and buildings.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: SENTINEL SYNERGY
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Additional Aggressors have been added to Sentinel Beacon and Ark Defense. . . All Protector Sentinels now have a small shield, increased health and damage.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Name: BANISHED RAID III
HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Capture speed for all units is now faster.. Ghosts can now capture points.. . Infantry & Vehicle sight range is now increased.. Ghosts, Wraiths, Choppers & Marauders are now faster.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to transport own units anywhere within range.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Vehicle production is now even cheaper and faster.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to drop a temporary turret into battle.

HW2LeaderPowerDisplayInfo.Description: Activate to drop a line of cloaked mines.. Once armed, mines explode on contact.. Does not damage air units.
